text:
Daniel Brocklebank (born 21 December 1979) is an English actor. He is best known for playing Billy Mayhew in the ITV soap opera, "Coronation Street", from 2014 onwards. He received a Screen Actors Guild Award for his performance in the multi-award-winning movie "Shakespeare in Love".
He is born in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire, England.
